name: Hidden Wiki |IN DEVELOPMENT|
description:
THIS IS IN VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT AND IS ONLY ABOUT 1% DONE.

The general idea is you start off with a Deep web site, then you make revenue from it. From the revenue you make from the website you buy more websites and make money from them. Everyone once and a while randomly the police may catch you and you will have to move location and if you do not have the funds to do so you will have to restart the game.
